articles.title: Republican election official in Philadelphia says he's seen no evidence of fraud
articles.description: A Republican city commissioner in Philadelphia said Wednesday that he has not seen any evidence of widespread fraud as the city continues to count mail-in and provisional ballots.

articles.title: Analysis: How Trump's 'perfect' phone call foretold his 2020 loss
articles.description: Even as far back as July 2019, Donald Trump knew that Joe Biden posed a major threat to his chances of winning a second term.

articles.title: Pfizer's CEO sold $5.6 million in stock the day he announced promising vaccine news
articles.description: Pfizer CEO Albert Bourla filed to sell millions of dollars of his company's stock Monday -- the day the pharmaceutical giant announced positive data about its coronnavirus vaccine.

articles.author: Nada Bashir, Mostafa Salem, Eyad Kourdi, Gul Tuysuz and Tim Lister, CNN
articles.title: Prominent Libyan lawyer Hanan al-Barassi gunned down in Benghazi
articles.description: Libya's UN-backed Government of National Accord has condemned the killing of prominent Libyan lawyer and women's rights activist Hanan al-Barassi, who was gunned down by armed men in the eastern city of Benghazi.

articles.author: Analysis by Harry Enten, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Joe Biden's win grows more decisive each day as votes are counted
articles.description: President Donald Trump's efforts to deny the outcome of the 2020 election cannot change an undeniable reality: Joe Biden won decisively, and his lead nationally and in key states has grown over time as more votes have been counted.
